headline.main: FOREIGN TRADE UP FOR YEAR IN JULY; $354,649,000 Export Total Compares With $316,669,000 in Month in 1940 72% FOR BRITISH EMPIRE Aggregate $257,000,000, Including Egypt -- Imports Rose to $277,847,0000 FOREIGN TRADE UP FOR YEAR IN JULY

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Oct. 3 -- Exports of merchandise from the United States in July amounted to $354,649,000, compared with $316,669,000 in the same month last year, the Department of Commerce reported today in revised statistics based on geographical areas.
abstract: Commerce Dept revised rept on trade with Brit Commonwealth, July
